issue.title: www.willyweather.com.au
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.willyweather.com.au/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.willyweather.com.au%2F) ### Comment > With Adguard Firefox extension activated, the Willy Weather location field does not provide results when a location or postcode is typed in (a progress wheel at the right hand end of the search box spins continuously). > > With Adguard deactivated the search box behaves as intended with location results offered in a drop down box. > > If it assists, the issue does not appear when using uBlock Origin with Adguard filters activated. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/FmqKgDD.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/WlWb43Z.png)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://reports-img.adguard.com/tQy27ds.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.39 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Block WebRTC,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking,
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
Legitimate URL Shortener

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist Other extensions used: | CanvasBlocker

issue.title: Unblock https://animevsub.ga
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0.75

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://app.animevsub.ml

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, KAD - Anti-Scam, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block WebRTC, Block Location API, Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. This is an open source application download site to watch Anime online
Source code: https://github.com/anime-vsub/app
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![Screenshot_2022-11-02-21-51-20](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45375496/199525114-c05b25fe-f288-453e-9cf3-58cbebbb0e0d.png)

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> > I could've sworn that the domain led to what seemed to be a Vietnamese manga sub team's project page soon after Sergey told me to check it, but now I too seem unable to load the page.
> 
> Probably temporary outage. Still strange that there aren't any Google results for it & VT didn't even know it existed before today.

I think this is a DNS error i moved the domain to https://app.animevsub.ga please check again

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://boxofficeturkiye.com/film/megan--2013738](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fboxofficeturkiye.com%2Ffilm%2Fmegan--2013738) ### Comment Username: @gototheskinny > AdGuard DNS iOS profile used. Only DNS causes this I guess ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/EyblEc3.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | AdGuard DNS Browser: | Safari Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
> Hello @gototheskinny
> 
> It seems that on ios the scripltet (current rule) doesn't always work in time. I duplicated it by CSS rules to make sure this popup will be blocked. 

Unfortunately this issue is still there for me. Only Adguard DNS filter has this issue with iOS profile dns or adguard iOS dns filter both of them has this issue. 
Tried with= Only enabling ag DNS didn't work, 
disabled dns than enabled Adguard app with only dns filter enabled didn't work,
tried with dns without filters + adguard base,Turkish,annoyance,mobile filter, worked wonderfully.

issue.title: www.sugardaddyseek.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [https://www.sugardaddyseek.com/baby-influencers-profiles?ad_source=promp_us_uk_ca_au&ad_campaign=promp4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sugardaddyseek.com%2Fbaby-influencers-profiles%3Fad_source%3Dpromp_us_uk_ca_au%26ad_campaign%3Dpromp4) ### Comment Username: @wgthor13 > A pop up came up on my DESKTOP not even in my browser. I'm running uBlock, AdGuard, Ghostery through a SurfShark VPN. I've NEVER seen an add come up on my desktop especially one so explicit. It also wouldn't let me close it without clicking it so I wasn't able to get a screenshot. I have since blacklisted that website through network settings on my PC. Thought I'd make ya'll aware. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/sBG6kA0.jpg)
